SEARCH

Class Client

java.lang.Object
Client
public class Client extends Object
This class represents the sender of the message. It sends the message to the receiver by means of a socket. The use of Object streams enables the sender to send any kind of object.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Client(int port, String nickname)
    Constructs a Sender object by specifying the port to connect to.

  • Constructor Details

    • Client

      public Client(int port, String nickname) throws Exception
      Constructs a Sender object by specifying the port to connect to. The socket must be created before the sender can send a message.
      Parameters:
      port - the port to connect to
      Throws:
      IOException - when an I/O error occurs when creating the socket
      Exception

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public void execute() throws IOException
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs when opening the socket

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage(String message) throws IOException
      Sends a message to the receiver using the OutputStream of the socket. The message is sent as an object of the Message class.
      Parameters:
      message - the message to send
      Throws:
      IOException - when the encryption or the integrity generation fails

    • receiveMessage

      public void receiveMessage() throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException
      Reads a Message object from the input stream and prints the sender and message content if the message type is USER_MESSAGE.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while reading the message.
      ClassNotFoundException - If the class of the serialized object cannot be found.

    • extractRecipients

      public static List<String> extractRecipients(String message)
      Extracts recipients mentioned in the message string using regular expressions.
      Parameters:
      message - The message string containing recipient mentions.
      Returns:
      A list of recipients extracted from the message.

    • extractMessage

      public static String extractMessage(String message)
      Extracts the message content from the message string by removing recipient mentions.
      Parameters:
      message - The message string containing recipient mentions.
      Returns:
      The message content without recipient mentions.
